extendedInfo.description: 14px is a challenging, addictive, fast paced platformer. Player reviews:"Game of the Year. Extremely fast-paced, addicting, frustrating, challenging, everything a pick-up-and-play mobile game should be. Hats off to the developer, this game is fantastic!" "Amazing music, perfect controls, and the perfect mix of skill and fun." "So hard to put down when you just have to get 3 stars on every level. Can't wait for more." "This game is a lot of fun! The controls are probably some of the best I've experienced on the iPhone thus far. " "This is a very difficult game that kills you constantly but there's a real satisfaction in getting through the whole level without dying very rarely do I enjoy a game on mobile phones as much as I enjoy this one" "Love it!Think Super Meat Boy, but with controls that work great on a phone." - 70 Levels - Regular updates - Online level editor - Create and share levels

reviews.title: Really Solid
reviews.comment: This is a great platformer. Good job. Would be better if it didn\'t take away audio context.
reviews.author: Adam Metcalf

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: The best platformer for android ever. And the dev is really nice and helpful.
reviews.author: Jacob Stein

reviews.title: Great game, no issues
reviews.comment: Runs great on my Nexus 10, and I\'m not having any frame drops or lack of audio that others seem to have. Extremely addicting, I couldn\'t stop until I had beaten all the levels with three stars, and without using the specials. I died quite a bit.
reviews.author: Alex Taylor

reviews.title: Great but Lags
reviews.comment: Fun and addictive, but for a 2D game, there\'s a lot of lag. Granted, I have a desire, but games like angry birds and crumble zone still run smoothly.  Improve this and i\'ll give it 5 stars.
reviews.author: Joshua Niranjan

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: Amazing game\' in play it a lot! It glitches at times even on my Nexus 7.
reviews.author: Garret Jackson

reviews.title: Great game, but
reviews.comment: There\'s no sound on my phone. Kinda kills the mood.
reviews.author: Andrew Garland

reviews.title: Finally completed it against all odds.
reviews.comment: This is a devilishly tough platformer made all the more difficult by frame drops and lags - on a Nexus 4! Unbelievable. Anyway, good game. I enjoyed it while it lasted.
reviews.author: Marcus Lee

reviews.title: On onscreen controls aren\'t good.
reviews.comment: Controls are either up, down, left, right which is bad as missing the diagonals which are needed (or at least help)  or you can have the diagonals but at the expense of up and down. Makes it just too hard and not in a good way.
reviews.author: Stephen Willoughby

reviews.title: Just Like Super Meat Boy
reviews.comment: This game is awesome and if your into super meatboy then this game is for you and even better its completly free. The games controls have been optimized for both small and 10inch screens. Be prepared to die allot in later levels thats the best part. And in a later update the game will have a level editor and level publishing
reviews.author: Marcus Carsner

reviews.title: Fantastic little game
reviews.comment: Great game and gave me a good time of frustration and fun. The only problem I had with it was there were a few mishaps with the controls however they were easily ignored.   Good job and hope to see some more levels soon!
reviews.author: Robert S.

reviews.title: Cool game app.
reviews.comment: Very addictive, it will bring you until you finish the levels. Great game.
reviews.author: Tamby A.

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Top game i like the minimalistic design very addictive 5*..If you like this game check out bounce ball its a stimilar type of game and its free?
reviews.author: Keith Fitzroy

reviews.title: To \"laggy\"
reviews.comment: Only 2 stars until you allow for baking out and writing using the back button. And I feel the affects of the bigger maps loading a lot whenever jumping, which obviously ends in death after a point every level has spikes everywhere..
reviews.author: Matt Andrea

reviews.title: I play this more than any other game
reviews.comment: This game is simple in theory but ridiculously challenging. Addicting and rewarding. My SGS3 plays it well with some small pockets of lag. I love it. Plus the music reminds me of old Sonic on SEGA so its nice. Great game. Thanks for the link on r/android!
reviews.author: CJ Boone

reviews.title: This little game is awesome!
reviews.comment: Seriously, just download it and play it, you won\'t be disappointed. Reminds me of the old school platformers I grew up with.
reviews.author: shane padgett

reviews.title: Great game but very laggy.
reviews.comment: This is a great game. It was an excellent time waster and is very addicting. The only problem I have with it is that it eventually gets very laggy to the point that it is unplayable. Once this is fixed this will be a 5 star game.
reviews.author: Ali Musaoglulari

reviews.title: Laaaaaag
reviews.comment: Amazing and unique game, but terrible lag in frame rate makes later levels laughably unplayable. Will change to five stars if fixed.  GS3.
reviews.author: Clay Mitchell

reviews.title: Very fun, needs polish.
reviews.comment: Way more fun than a bunch of the top games. Needs some optimizations however.
reviews.author: Trey Nelson

reviews.title: Bugs
reviews.comment: Real fun and addicting. But buttons dont work half the time which takes all the fun out of it.
reviews.author: Tyler Hall
